ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LD50 Anas platyrhychos (Mallard, female, 4 months old) oral 587 mg/kg (95% Confidence limits: 397-869 mg/kg)

EC50; Species: Daphnia magna (Water flea, age 0-24 hr); Conditions: freshwater, flow through, 17.2 °C (16.5-18.4 °C), pH 7.39 (6.84-7.80), hardness 44.7 mg/L CaCO3 (40.8-47.6 mg/L), alkalinity 43.0 mg/L CaCO3 (40.4-49.5 mg/L), dissolved oxygen 8.7 mg/L (4.8-10.7 mg/L); Concentration: 3250 ug/L for 48 hr (95% confidence interval: 2720-3880 ug/L); Effect: intoxication, immobilization
